marytts.htsengine
Class HTSModel

java.lang.Object
  marytts.htsengine.HTSModel

public class HTSModel
extends java.lang.Object

HMM model for a particular phone (or line in context feature file) This model is the unit when building a utterance model sequence. For every phone (or line)in the context feature file, one of these models is created. Java port and extension of HTS engine version 2.0 Extension: mixed excitation

Author:
Marcela Charfuelan
